title: Shadowflame Hex Doll
summaries: The Shadowflame Hex Doll is a Hardmode magic weapon that fires three curving purple tentacle projectiles per use at a decent range, inflicting the Shadowflame debuff onto damaged enemies for 1â€“3 seconds. While it only fires three tentacles per shot, it can be used continuously to fire up to nine projectiles at once. The Shadowflame Hex Doll has a 1/6 (16.67%) / 1/3 (33.33%) chance to drop from Goblin Warlocks during a Hardmode Goblin Army.
